languages.text: "Затем за девочкой пришли слуги Его и забрали в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}. Девочка до жопы много трудилась, пока не повстречала {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллику{/g} и стала хорошенько поживать на пригретом местечке. За что однажды чуть не поплатилась головой, попав под внутреннее расследование Оффицио Префектус и Департменто Муниторум. Ну а потом — сбежала в Простор".

traits.locale_text: "Затем за девочкой пришли слуги Его и забрали в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}. Девочка до жопы много трудилась, пока не повстречала {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллику{/g} и стала хорошенько поживать на пригретом местечке. За что однажды чуть не поплатилась головой, попав под внутреннее расследование Оффицио Префектум и Департменто Муниторум. Ну а потом — сбежала в Простор".

languages.text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."
languages.original_text: "Затем за девочкой пришли слуги Его и забрали в {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Астра Милитарум{/g}. Девочка до жопы много трудилась, пока не повстречала {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллику{/g} и стала хорошенько поживать на пригретом местечке. За что однажды чуть не поплатилась головой, попав под внутреннее расследование Оффицио Префектус и Департменто Муниторум. Ну а потом — сбежала в Простор".

traits.locale_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl to {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked herself down to the bone until she met {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}the Kasballica{/g} and carved out a good life for herself in a cozy spot. Which almost cost the girl her head when she came under internal investigation between Officio Prefectum and Departamento Munitorum. So she fled into the Expanse."

"Then His servants came and took the girl to {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked herself down to the bone until she met {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}the Kasballica{/g} and carved out a good life for herself in a cozy spot. Which almost cost the girl her head when she came under internal investigation between Officio Prefectum and Departamento Munitorum. So she fled into the Expanse."

"Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectum and the Departamento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

"Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectum and the Departamento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

"Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and the Departamento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

languages.text: “随后，神皇的仆人来了，把那个女孩带到了{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}。那个女孩拼了命地工作，直到她遇到了{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}。在那之后，她在帝国卫队的小角落里过上了奢侈的生活。然而，这样的生活差点害得那个女孩掉了脑袋，因为政务部和军务部的人开始调查她了，于是她逃到了科罗努斯扩区。”
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: “随后，神皇的仆人来了，把那个女孩带到了{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}星界军{/g}。那个女孩拼了命地工作，直到她遇到了{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}。在那之后，她在帝国卫队的小角落里过上了奢侈的生活。然而，这样的生活差点害得那个女孩掉了脑袋，因为政务部和军务部的人开始调查她了，于是她逃到了科罗努斯扩区。”

languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the Astra Militarum. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the Kasballica and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and the Departamento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

languages.text: «Después, Sus sirvientes llegaron para llevarse a la niña al {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. La niña se dejó la piel hasta que conoció a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y comenzó a vivir la buena vida en su rinconcito de la Guardia Imperial. Y esa buena vida casi le costó la cabeza a la niña cuando el Officio Prefectus y el Departmento Munitorum empezaron a investigar sus actividades. Así que huyó a la Extensión».
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: «Después, Sus sirvientes llegaron para llevarse a la niña al {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. La niña se dejó la piel hasta que conoció a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} y comenzó a vivir la buena vida en su rinconcito de la Guardia Imperial. Y esa buena vida casi le costó la cabeza a la niña cuando el Officio Prefectus y el Departmento Munitorum empezaron a investigar sus actividades. Así que huyó a la Extensión».

languages.text: 「その後、主の召使いがやってきて、少女を{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}に連れて行った。少女は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と出会い、帝国軍の片隅で高貴な暮らしを始めるまで、必死になって働いたわ。そしてその高貴な暮らしは、帝国管理局と帝国兵務局の調査を受け、あやうく少女の首を落とすこととなりかけた。それで彼女はエクスパンスに逃げ込んだんだのよ」
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: 「その後、主の召使いがやってきて、少女を{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}に連れて行った。少女は{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}と出会い、帝国軍の片隅で高貴な暮らしを始めるまで、必死になって働いたわ。そしてその高貴な暮らしは、帝国管理局と帝国兵務局の調査を受け、あやうく少女の首を落とすこととなりかけた。それで彼女はエクスパンスに逃げ込んだんだのよ」

languages.text: "Dann kamen seine Diener und brachten das Mädchen ins {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Sie arbeitete sich die kleinen Hände wund, bis sie die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} kennenlernte und anfing, in ihrer kleinen Ecke der Imperialen Armee ein ausschweifendes Leben zu führen. Und dieses ausschweifende Leben hätte das Mädchen fast den Kopf gekostet, als das Officio Prefectus und das Departmento Munitorum anfingen, gegen sie zu ermitteln. Also floh sie in die Ausdehnung."
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Dann kamen seine Diener und brachten das Mädchen ins {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Sie arbeitete sich die kleinen Hände wund, bis sie die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} kennenlernte und anfing, in ihrer kleinen Ecke der Imperialen Armee ein ausschweifendes Leben zu führen. Und dieses ausschweifende Leben hätte das Mädchen fast den Kopf gekostet, als das Officio Prefectus und das Departamento Munitorum anfingen, gegen sie zu ermitteln. Also floh sie in die Ausdehnung."

"Dann kamen seine Diener und brachten das Mädchen ins {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Sie arbeitete sich die kleinen Hände wund, bis sie die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} kennenlernte und anfing, in ihrer kleinen Ecke der Imperialen Armee ein ausschweifendes Leben zu führen. Und dieses ausschweifende Leben hätte das Mädchen fast den Kopf gekostet, als das Officio Prefectus und das Departamento Munitorum anfingen, gegen sie zu ermitteln. Also floh sie in die Ausdehnung."

languages.text: « Alors, les serviteurs de l'Empereur vinrent enrôler la fillette dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Elle travailla d'arrache-pied jusqu'à ce qu'elle rencontre la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et commence à mener grand train dans son petit coin de la Garde Impériale. Mais cette époque faste faillit lui coûter la vie lorsqu'elle fit l'objet d'une enquête menée par l'Officio Prefectus et le Departmento Munitorum C'est ainsi qu'elle prit la fuite et se réfugia dans les Étendues de Koronus. »
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, les serviteurs de l'Empereur vinrent enrôler la fillette dans l'{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. Elle travailla d'arrache-pied jusqu'à ce qu'elle rencontre la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} et commence à mener grand train dans son petit coin de la Garde Impériale. Mais cette époque faste faillit lui coûter la vie lorsqu'elle fit l'objet d'une enquête menée par l'Officio Prefectus et le Departmento Munitorum C'est ainsi qu'elle prit la fuite et se réfugia dans les Étendues de Koronus. »

languages.text: "Sonra O'nun hizmetkârları gelmiş ve kızı {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum'a{/g} almış. Küçük kız kendini canla başla çalışmaya adamış, sonra bir gün {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'yla{/g} karşılaşıp İmparatorluk Muhafızları bünyesinde izbe, güzel bir hayat sürmeye başlamış. Bu güzel hayat, Officio Prefektus ve Departmento Munitorum incelemeleri sırasında onu neredeyse canından edecekmiş. O da Enginlik'e kaçmış."
languages.original_text: "Then His servants came and took the girl into the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}. The girl worked her little arse off until she met the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g} and started living the high life in her little corner of the Imperial Guard. And that high life almost cost the girl her head when she came under investigation by the Officio Prefectus and Departmento Munitorum. So she fled to the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: "Sonra O'nun hizmetkârları gelmiş ve kızı {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Astra Militarum{/g}'a almış. Küçük kız kendini canla başla çalışmaya adamış, sonra bir gün {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'yla karşılaşmış ve İmparatorluk Muhafızları'nın izbe bir köşesinde güzel bir hayat sürmeye başlamış. Bu güzel hayat, Officio Prefectus ve Departamento Munitorum incelemeleri sırasında ona neredeyse hayatına mâl olacakmış. O da Enginlik'e kaçmış."
